LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Animal_ResourceTypeDesc: The resource produced by this creature.
LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Animal_ResourceAmountDesc: The amount of resources collected from this creature every production interval.
LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Animal_ResourceIntervalDesc: How many days must pass before this creature completes a production cycle.
LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Animal_ResourcePerYearDesc: How many resources can be collected from this creature in a year, given optimal collections and full productivity.
LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Animal_ResourceValueDesc: How much the product of this creature is worth.
LanguageData.ABF_Stat_Animal_ResourceValuePerYearDesc: How much value this creature produces per year, given optimal collections and full productivity.
